title: The Transient Soliloquy: A Vibrant Collection of Verse
description: ‘The Transient Soliloquy’ refreshingly enlightens through an intense communication with one’s own self. It opens the eye of the mind to capture a myriad of picturesque emotions on the natural and surreal canvas of life through the medium of rhyming verse.
author: Pradipta Roy Choudhury
